intents.name: greet
responses: Hello! How can I assist you with your luxury travel plans today?

intents.name: inquire_sindalah
responses: Sindalah Island is a paradise for luxury travel with pristine beaches, exotic flora and fauna, and our exclusive, futuristic airport. You can expect a truly unique experience.
utterances: I want to know more about Sindalah Island
What can I expect at Sindalah?

intents.name: book_flight
responses: Your flight to Sindalah is booked for {travel_date} in {travel_class}. Your booking ID is {booking_id}.
utterances: I want to book a flight to Sindalah
Can I reserve a flight to Sindalah?
I'd like to fly to Sindalah

slots.name: travel_date
slots.bot_ask: When do you plan to travel to Sindalah?

slots.name: travel_class
slots.bot_ask: Which class would you prefer for your flight - First, Business or VIP Private?

intents.name: ask_recommendations
responses: In Sindalah, you can enjoy beachfront dining, snorkeling in crystal clear waters, explore exotic wildlife, or simply relax on our pristine beaches.
utterances: What activities would you recommend in Sindalah?
Can you suggest things to do in Sindalah?
I'm looking for recommendations in Sindalah

intents.name: inquire_booking_status
responses: Your flight to Sindalah is booked for {travel_date} in {travel_class}. Your booking ID is {booking_id}.
utterances: What's the status of my booking?
Can you confirm my flight details?
I'd like to check my booking

slots.name: booking_id
slots.bot_ask: Could you please provide your booking ID for me to check your booking details?
